title: Rajputana Polki Kundan Ring - Heritage Bloom
features: Intricate floral design with a central Polki diamond surrounded by concentric layers of diamond simulants and vibrant rubies. Features an open setting, allowing light to enhance the brilliance of the gemstones. The design showcases the traditional Kundan setting, where the stones are embedded with gold foil for a secure and aesthetically pleasing finish.
occasions: and other special occasions where a touch of traditional elegance is desired. Also suitable for modern cocktail parties and sophisticated gatherings.
description: This ring beautifully marries the timeless appeal of Kundan jewelry with a contemporary aesthetic. The Polki diamond adds a unique, natural sparkle, while the ruby accents bring a touch of regal color. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and using only the finest materials, this ring is a true investment piece that will be cherished for generations. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster and antique charm.
